Function Reference: gensig

Function File: [u, t] = gensig (sigtype, tau)
Function File: [u, t] = gensig (sigtype, tau, tfinal)
Function File: [u, t] = gensig (sigtype, tau, tfinal, tsam)

Generate periodic signal.

**Inputs**

1)sigtype: Type of signal to plot
	i)Sine wave: sigtype = "sin"
	ii)Cosine wave: sigtype = "cos"
	iii)Square wave: sigtype = "square"
	iv)Periodic pulse: sigtype = "pulse"

2)tau: Duration of one period in seconds.

3)tfinal (Optional): Duration of the signal in seconds. Default duration is 5 periods.

4)tsam (Optional): sampling time in seconds. Default spacing is tau/64.

**Outputs**

1)u: Vector of signal values.

2)t: Time vector of the signal.

**Test case**

1) 
*Input*
[x,t]=gensig('sin',1,1)

*Output*
 x = [65x1 double]

   0.
   0.0980171
   0.1950903
   0.2902847
   0.3826834
   0.4713967
   0.5555702
   0.6343933
   0.7071068
   0.7730105
   0.8314696
   0.8819213
   0.9238795
   0.9569403
   0.9807853
   0.9951847
   1.

   0.9807853
